channel.title: Comments on: Chicken Curry with Blueberries and Goji Berry Pilau

item.title: By: Jonathan Perry
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Perry
item.description: Trust me, I made it, and it tasted great. I don't think 3 tablespoons of olive oil is fattening for 4 people, or is it?
item.content:encoded: Trust me, I made it, and it tasted great. I don’t think 3 tablespoons of olive oil is fattening for 4 people, or is it?

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: Wow, such a unique dish! Very healthy--lots of antioxidents in the dark berries! Great recipe.
item.content:encoded: Wow, such a unique dish! Very healthy–lots of antioxidents in the dark berries! Great recipe.

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
Anita, this dish is a keeper. I am sure it is not only delicious but great for health. Thanks for sharing and starting a healthy year for all of us!
Sawadee from bangkok, kris
item.content:encoded:
Anita, this dish is a keeper. I am sure it is not only delicious but great for health. Thanks for sharing and starting a healthy year for all of us!

Sawadee from bangkok,
kris

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: What an interesting combination of flavor! Curry and blueberry...would love to try it! The pilaf looks delicious as well...nice pictures Anita!
item.content:encoded: What an interesting combination of flavor! Curry and blueberry…would love to try it! The pilaf looks delicious as well…nice pictures Anita!

item.title: By: Auntie Liz
item.dc:creator: Auntie Liz
item.description: This looks very interesting. Will be giving it a try as I enjoy curries and blueberries.
item.content:encoded: This looks very interesting. Will be giving it a try as I enjoy curries and blueberries.

item.title: By: Judy
item.dc:creator: Judy
item.description: Very interesting recipe. I won honorable mention in a contest for my recipe for blueberry black pepper chicken, so this doesn't sound too far out to me.
item.content:encoded: Very interesting recipe. I won honorable mention in a contest for my recipe for blueberry black pepper chicken, so this doesn’t sound too far out to me.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Wow, that's a weird one, so it's great to hear it tastes good. Lovely blueberries on your bush too!
item.content:encoded: Wow, that’s a weird one, so it’s great to hear it tastes good. Lovely blueberries on your bush too!

item.title: By: Kate
item.dc:creator: Kate
item.description: Hi Anita, Just finished reading through your archives. Wow. You are amazing to be creating such wonderful foodie treats. Thanks for inspiring me to eat again after being so sick all last year. Im really looking forward to reading more of your blog in the future. Kate xx
item.content:encoded: Hi Anita, Just finished reading through your archives. Wow. You are amazing to be creating such wonderful foodie treats. Thanks for inspiring me to eat again after being so sick all last year. Im really looking forward to reading more of your blog in the future. Kate xx

item.title: By: Cakelaw
item.dc:creator: Cakelaw
item.description: I have never tried goji berries. I will also admit that I would have been skeptical about the combination too - but glad it was delicious. The pilau looks superb.
item.content:encoded: I have never tried goji berries. I will also admit that I would have been skeptical about the combination too – but glad it was delicious. The pilau looks superb.

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Haha I tried to do that with a NYE cocktail too. Great idea, I have a bag of goji berries that I want to do something different with. It sounds like a nice alternative to currants in a pilau!
item.content:encoded: Haha I tried to do that with a NYE cocktail too. Great idea, I have a bag of goji berries that I want to do something different with. It sounds like a nice alternative to currants in a pilau!
